skills.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
skills.description: Proficient in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), with hands-on experience in solving complex problems and optimizing code for efficiency.

skills.title: Database Management System
skills.description: Skilled in Database Management Systems with expertise in SQL, data modeling, normalization, and using tools like MySQL and PostgreSQL.

skills.title: Full-stack Development
skills.description: Experienced in full-stack development, including both front-end and back-end technologies, with a focus on building robust and scalable applications.

skills.title: Object Oriented Programming
skills.description: Skilled in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles, including design patterns, inheritance, and encapsulation, applied to create maintainable and efficient code.

portfolio.title: FreshBite
portfolio.description: The Food Ordering App is a full-stack application built with the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack. It allows users to browse restaurants, place orders, and manage their accounts. This project demonstrates the integration of various technologies to create a comprehensive food ordering system.

portfolio.title: Skill Academy
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack online learning platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and MySQL. Features include course creation, multimedia management with Mux, payment processing via Stripe, and user authentication through Clerk, enabling instructors and users to manage and track course performance.
